committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation
Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: An act for the relief of Jerry L. Crow and Ralph D. and Connie V. Hubbell.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to sell to a named individual not more than ten acres of land which such individual shall select from certain public lands in the State of Alaska. Grants a thirty-year lease with an option to buy to such individual for certain other public lands.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Jerry L. Crow.
An act for the relief of Jerry L. Crow and Ralph D. and Connie V. Hubbell.
